name: Flexible AD Object Search Wrapper
description: Build a reusable PowerShell function to query any AD object type with wildcard filters.

steps.name: Create Search Utility
steps.command: function Find-ADObject { param([string]$Pattern='*',[string]$ObjectType='user'); Get-ADObject -Filter "objectClass -eq '$ObjectType' -and name -like '$Pattern'" -Properties Name,sAMAccountName,DistinguishedName | Select Name,sAMAccountName,DistinguishedName }
